features: ★Naturally, fuller, thicker eyebrows Soap gel is a clear setting product that when brushed through the natural eyebrow adds thickness, volume and texture, creates super hot wild natural feathery.

★Directions: Wet your brush with water and rub it over the surface of the soap, then brush through your brows upwards until your brows are fluffy, full and beachy. Pencil or other brow products may be applied before the soap.

★The all-natural and organic formula is designed specifically for brows, so this is no ordinary soap. Designed to be left on the skin (rather than washed off), it’s free from fragrance, color, and foaming agents, so it won’t lather up, cause irritation, or leave unwanted residue in your brows.
★Give you big and beautiful eyebrows and eyelashes naturally. Great for brow shaping, used to tame unruly brows and boost brow color. Make your face more stereo, perfect eyebrow dye cream choice.
★Package: 2 x Eyebrow Soap（the brush is inside the box）
body.description: 2 Pack Eyebrow Soap Kit Brows Soap was created to style brushed up eyebrows. Whether you have sparse brows that need a helping hand or you are rocking that bushy look, you can get fluffy brows using Brow Soap. Eyebrow shaping soap, colorless, odorless, transparent, unlike ordinary soap. Excellent stereotypes, making your eyebrows three-dimensional, natural and dense. Developed to create a perfectly groomed brow, Brow Soap is the product that broke the internet in the name of fuller-looking, natural brows. The formula has an instantly thickening effect with extra hold for beautifully styled brows all day long.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eyebrow Soap Kit Brow Soap Styling Kit Natural ingredients Handmade With Care Sweat and Waterproof Use the included brush to gather some product, until it becomes quite tacky then coat your brow hairs. Leave for a minute or so then go back and shape. Now reach for your phone and take a selfie !!! 2 Pack Eyebrow Soap Kit Brows Soap was created to style brushed up eyebrows. Whether you have sparse brows that need a helping hand or you are rocking that bushy look, you can get fluffy brows using Brow Soap. Eyebrow shaping soap, colorless, odorless, transparent, unlike ordinary soap. Excellent stereotypes, making your eyebrows three-dimensional, natural and dense. Developed to create a perfectly groomed brow, Brow Soap is the product that broke the internet in the name of fuller-looking, natural brows. The formula has an instantly thickening effect with extra hold for beautifully styled brows all day long.

Using Methods Spray some water to the brush, take some soap with your brush, then brush through your brows, flicking upwards and out to create a "featured" look. SAFETY MATERIAL Our brow styling soap is made of mild and non-irritating materials, chemical free，safe to use. Use with an eyebrow pencil or eyebrow powder for longer-lasting. UPDATED VERSION Our eyebrow soap, unlike ordinary brow soap, is colorless, tasteless, and transparent. It helps you have a popular trend "wild eyebrow", providing a natural look for your eyebrows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPRISED! IT STAYED LONG
reviews.reviewText: I do have asian stubborn eyebrows, I used hair gel because I have nothing else but it started to get so flakey, so I decide to try this out. I wish this includes tint option since I don't have much eyebrow hair + color, but maybe there is one but I didn't see it yet. It hard little hard to use bc I realize I need to wet my spooly brush more to be able to scrub the soap. It was pretty tacky feel and shaped well, and it last me all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really nice and lots of product. Remember to spray just one little spritz of water onto the spoolie to not get it soapy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the most part it works. It doesn’t stay all day but maybe I’m not putting enough. It’s waxy so not sure how much more I could put reasonably. But for the most part it does the job.Based on other reviews you have to set the brush first to apply. That really should be a part of the instructions 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't really work :(
reviews.reviewText: The gel is a texture that doesn't apply well to my eyebrows at least, they don't stay straight and brushed for a long time. I did like the little brush it comes with, it brushes the eyebrows hairs nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It doesn’t do anything.
reviews.reviewText: There’s a possibility that I could have been doing it wrong but i mean, I’m not sure how many other ways there are to rub a spoolie (spooly?) onto the balm. You have to rub it pretty hard and by that point, your brush is all messed up and you can’t even get the product on. I restored to rubbing my finger in there to warm up the product then smearing it onto my brow and using the brush to help style it the way I wanted but even that didn’t work out very well. The balm was just so dry. It could have been that the ones I got were just bone dry but I don’t know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how it works, I can use dark eye shadow to fill in my brows on top of the wax. I need to use disposable mascara applicators because the wax cakes on wand after a few uses.
Very good, one thing I was stupid about was attempting to use it dry, please use water 👍🏽It KEEPS your eyebrows in shape, lasts more than a day for me, easy to wash off, amazing

I didn’t know that the order came with 2 brushes which was a surprise. What I don’t like is that after putting water on the brush as per instructions, it gets very soapy on the eyebrows. I have to wipe the bubbles away but other than that the product is good enough.
Leaves white residue on your eyebrows when used with water.. but you need to use water bc it’s hard as a hard. Don’t buy.
Does not leave residue when used properly. Holds hair in place. Easy to use. Easy to remove. Will last a very long time.
If you dont have time to draw your eyebrow, this is for you. It keeps it in place and you still look like you used a brow liner.
